Primary Contact: Mike Greer, Executive Director, Elevation Outdoors; Email: mike@elevationoutdoors.ca
Service Details: - Enhances the lives of underprivileged youth via participation in specially designed outdoor sports programs- Helps youth develop lasting passion for these sports while drawing parallels to life through the experience and learning life skills along the way- Programs are offered to eligible youth free of charge, and include snowboarding, sailing, rock climbing and mountain biking- Offers the 3-day summer camp Intro, Adventure Summer Camp Program, for local young people to introduce them to different outdoor sports available in the region
Eligibility: Ages: 12 year(s) - 18 year(s)Youth with financial or social disadvantages
How to Apply: Please visit the website for additional information and to apply
Cost: For eligible youth there is no fee for our regular programsNote that there is a fee for the summer camps
